content:
advertisement

Flying vaulting flips cartwheels and amazing athleticism  no its not a night of gymnastics at Rec Hall but the newest show to make its way across the stage at Eisenhower Auditorium PERIOD

AEROS is breaking all the rules of choreography and gymnastics PERIOD It is a show unlike anything else  not modern dance and not typical gymnastics routines PERIOD

Peter Wray press and public relations manager for the Center for the Performing Arts tried to put into words what the audience will actually see PERIOD  he said PERIOD

The performance is around  minutes long attempts to challenge the laws of gravity and puts the sheer strength and flexibility of the athletes to the test PERIOD

Throughout the performance the choreographers attempt to weave movements and tumbling into a perfect harmony PERIOD

 Wray said PERIOD

Fifteen former members of the Romanian Gymnastics Federation make up the group of talented athletes PERIOD

They range in age from  to  PERIOD Five of the gymnasts are world champions in artistic rhythmic and sports aerobics while several of the other gymnasts are European champions PERIOD

AEROS is the joint effort of three acclaimed choreographers Daniel Ezralow David Parsons and Moses Pendleton PERIOD However all three come from very different worlds PERIOD

Ezralow a native of Los Angeles began to dance when he was a premedicine major at the University of California at Berkeley PERIOD He cofounded ISO Dance in  and has toured worldwide with the group PERIOD Through his travels Ezralow was also able to choreograph several dances for numerous companies PERIOD

He has been involved in several other ventures such as choreographing music videos for greats like Sting U2 and David Bowie PERIOD In  Ezralow won the Bob Fosse dance award for alternative choreography PERIOD

Parsons was raised in Kansas City Mo PERIOD and received his first lead dancer status with the Paul Taylor Dance Company PERIOD He began his own dance company in  and has created over  programs for his company to perform PERIOD Parsons has choreographed several shows for other companies such as American Ballet Theatre New York City Ballet and National Ballet of Canada PERIOD

He was also the only artist to be featured twice as  on AEs Breakfast With the Arts  PERIOD

Pendleton was born and raised on a dairy farm in Vermont PERIOD His entrance into the world of performance was exhibiting Holstein Friesians at county fairs PERIOD In  he received a degree in English Literature and cofounded the Pilobolus Dance Theatre PERIOD For the  Winter Olympics in Lake Placid Pendleton choreographed the closing ceremonies PERIOD

He is also and avid photographer in his spare time PERIOD His photos have been exhibited in such cities as London Milan and Montreal PERIOD

The show was also developed with the help and collaboration of STOMP creators Luke Cresswell and Steve McNicholas PERIOD

The music for the show was specially composed by Two Tall Guys Music Lab in Toronto PERIOD The young company operates as a compositional team for television film videos and multimedia and creates a wide range of sounds through instruments invented and developed by the company PERIOD

AEROS is in its first year of touring and has been receiving rave reviews from several critics across the country PERIOD Earlier this year the company made an appearance on the Grammy Awards with Destinys Child and performed one of its programs that will be performed at Eisenhower Auditorium PERIOD

Wray said this is a performance not to be missed PERIOD The company is brand new and presents a different perspective on the fine arts PERIOD

 Wray said PERIOD

Tickets are available at the Eisenhower Auditorium Box Office PERIOD The cost for general admission is  studentsyouths  Penn State students  and children  and under  PERIOD
